lead_paragraph: A $5.5 million gift by Venture Philanthropy Partners will help finance a network of charter schools in the Washington, D.C., school system. According to The Washington Post, the grant from the venture capital firm was expected to be announced Monday and would dramatically help expand the Knowledge Is Power Program schools in the city.

headline.main: V.C. Grant Will Underwrite Charter Schools in D.C. Kids

abstract: A $5.5 million gift by Venture Philanthropy Partners will fund the Washington, D.C., Knowledge Is Power Program schools. According to The Washington Post, the grant is to be announced Monday and will dramatically help expand the network of schools in the city.
